ias_1_presentation.reason_of_the_status: Financial statements include all required statements (financial position, profit or loss, changes in equity, cash flows, notes). Fair presentation and compliance with IFRS stated.
ias_1_presentation.status_reference: Auditor's opinion, Note 03, All primary statements

ias_2_inventories.reason_of_the_status: Inventories (fabrics, accessories, work-in-process) measured at weighted average cost. Disclosed by categories.
ias_2_inventories.status_reference: Note 04(d), Note 07, Statement of Financial Position

ias_7_statement_of_cash_flows.reason_of_the_status: Cash flow statement provided with operating, investing, financing activities but format is simplified and lacks detailed line items (e.g., tax paid, interest paid).

ias_8_accounting_policies.reason_of_the_status: Accounting policies disclosed in Note 04. No changes in accounting policies reported.

ias_10_events_after_reporting_period.reason_of_the_status: No events after reporting period disclosed in the financial statements.

ias_12_income_taxes.reason_of_the_status: Provision for income tax recognized based on TDS. Current tax liability disclosed. No deferred tax assets/liabilities mentioned.

ias_16_property_plant_equipment.reason_of_the_status: PP&E at cost less depreciation, with detailed schedule. Depreciation method and rates disclosed.

ias_19_employee_benefits.reason_of_the_status: Short-term employee benefits (wages, bonuses) recognized. No defined benefit plans disclosed. Earn leave and resignation benefits recognized as incurred, but no actuarial valuations disclosed.
ias_19_employee_benefits.status_reference: Note 17 (Direct Labor), Statement of Profit or Loss

ias_21_effects_of_changes_in_foreign_exc.reason_of_the_status: Foreign currency transactions translated at transaction/balance sheet rates as per disclosed policy.

ias_23_borrowing_costs.reason_of_the_status: Borrowing costs (interest) expensed as incurred as per disclosed policy.

ias_24_related_party_disclosures.reason_of_the_status: Intercompany transactions and balances disclosed (Notes 13,14). Shareholdings disclosed (Note 05). However, no comprehensive related party disclosure note covering all relationships, transactions, and terms.

ias_27_separate_financial_statements.reason_of_the_status: Investment in Envoy Garments Ltd. (subsidiary) accounted for at cost in separate financial statements.

ias_28_investments_in_associates_and_joi.reason_of_the_status: No investments in associates or joint ventures.

ias_29_financial_reporting_in_hyperinfla.reason_of_the_status: Bangladesh is not a hyperinflationary economy.

ias_32_financial_instruments_presentatio.reason_of_the_status: Financial instruments presented (loans, receivables, payables) but no detailed classification, no disclosure of compound instruments or equity vs liability analysis.

ias_33_earnings_per_share.reason_of_the_status: Not a publicly listed entity; EPS disclosure not required.

ias_34_interim_financial_reporting.reason_of_the_status: These are annual, not interim, financial statements.
